title: Comprehensive Testing

detailed_design.description: Add comprehensive test coverage including adapter tests, integration tests, E2E tests, and frontend tests. Currently only router and security have minimal tests. Achieve >80% coverage across all modules.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Add unit tests for all adapters. 2. Add integration tests for router+adapters. 3. Add E2E tests for API endpoints. 4. Add frontend component tests. 5. Add frontend integration tests. 6. Achieve >80% coverage.

acceptance_criteria: Unit tests for all adapter classes
Integration tests for router with real adapters
E2E tests for all API endpoints

user_stories.story: As a developer, I want comprehensive tests to catch regressions.
As a contributor, I want confidence that my changes don't break existing functionality.

technical_notes.current_issue: Minimal test coverage, no adapter/integration/E2E/frontend tests
